\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj\b WHEREAS\b0 , the New York City Department of Housing Preservation and Development (\ldblquote HPD\rdblquote ) submitted to the Council its request dated October 16, 2015 that the Council \cf1 amend a previously approved tax exemption \cf0 for property located at (Block 375, Lot 30) Manhattan (\ldblquote Exemption Area\rdblquote );\par

\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj\cf0\par

\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj The Council approves the amendment to the Prior Resolution requested by HPD for the Exemption Area pursuant to\cf0  \cf1 Section 577 of the Private Housing Finance Law as follows:\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj Paragraph 5(a) of the Prior Resolution is deleted and replaced with the following new paragraph 5(a):\cf0\par
\pard\ltrpar\hyphpar0\tx576\tx1152\tx1728\tx2304\tx2880\tx3456\tx4032\tx4608\tx5184\tx5760\tx6336\tx6912\tx7488\tx8064\tx8640\tx9216\tx9792\tx10368\tx10944\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li1440\qj 5. (a)\tab The Exemption shall terminate if HPD determines at any time that (i) the Exemption Area is not being operated in accordance with the requirements of Article XI of the Private Housing Finance Law, \cf1 (ii) the owner of the Exemption Area has failed to execute the Regulatory Agreement by November 1, 2016, \cf0 (iii) the Exemption Area is not being operated in accordance with the requirements of the Regulatory Agreement, (iv) the Exemption Area is not being operated in accordance with the requirements of any other agreement with, or for the benefit of, the City of New York, (v) the Exemption Area is conveyed to a new owner without the prior written approval of HPD, or (vi) the demolition of any private or multiple dwelling on the Exemption Area has commenced without the prior written consent of HPD.  HPD shall deliver written notice of any such determination to Owner and all mortgagees of record, which notice shall provide for an opportunity to cure of not less than sixty (60) days.  If the noncompliance specified in such notice is not cured within the time period specified therein, the Exemption shall prospectively terminate.\par
